caption: cyRespond to a property possession claim
heading: cyYou’re entitled to free legal advice before you submit your response
secondaryHeading: cyRespond to a property possession claim
question: cyHave you had any free legal advice?
hadLegalAdviceHint: cyWe’re asking this question so we can check everyone is getting the free support they’re entitled to. Your answer will not affect the outcome of the claim
paragraph1: cyHousing experts are ready and waiting to help you, and it takes just minutes to find one in your area.
listItem1: cyVisit the find a legal adviser service Find a legal adviser service (opens in new tab).
listItem2: cyEnter your postcode and select the 'Housing Loss Prevention Advice Service' and ‘Housing’ options.
listItem4: cyCall them to discuss your options.
paragraph2: cyCivil Legal Advice (CLA) can also put you in touch with a local expert. You can either:
bullet1: cycall 0345 345 4345. Lines are open Monday to Friday, from 9am to 8pm and Saturday from 9am to 12.30pm
bullet2: cytext ‘legalaid’ and your name to 80010 to ask CLA to call you back. This costs the same as a normal text message
subHeading2: cyHelp that might be available at the hearing
paragraph3: cyIf you do not have your own legal adviser, you might be able to speak to a duty adviser (a legal professional who helps people at court) on the day of your hearing. If they’re available, they can give you advice and represent you at the hearing for free.
paragraph4: cyIf you want to speak to the duty adviser, arrive at least 45 minutes before your hearing.
